original: bod skad du /üîΩlha mo nor rgyun ma la bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / lha mo nor rgyun ma la bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩPraise to Goddess Vasudhara

original: lha mo nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lha mo nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Goddess Vasudhara!

original: ae ma bum pa rin chen gter ldan steng //
analyzed: ae ma bum pa rin chen gter ldan steng //
translated: Amazing! Upon a jeweled treasure vase,

original: de steng skyon bral nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: de steng skyon bral nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: Upon a stainless sun ma·πá·∏çala,

original: gdod nas dag pas sku mdog gser lta bu //
analyzed: gdod nas dag pas sku mdog gser lta bu //
translated: Pure from the beginning, your body is golden in color,

original: ma bcos rang bzhin byis pa'i gzugs 'dra ba //
analyzed: ma bcos rang bzhin byis pa'i gzugs 'dra ba //
translated: Uncontrived, with a natural youthful form,

original: snyan mgur phyag zhabs rin chen phreng bas brgyan //
analyzed: snyan mgur phyag zhabs rin chen phreng bas brgyan //
translated: Adorned with precious garlands on your ears, neck, hands, and feet.

original: zla rgyas ltar mdzes 'phags ma'i sku la 'dud //
analyzed: zla rgyas ltar mdzes 'phags ma'i sku la 'dud //
translated: Beautiful like a full moon, I bow to the noble one's body.

original: brtse ldan sbyin pa grub pa'i tshul mnga' ba //
analyzed: brtse ldan sbyin pa grub pa'i tshul mnga' ba //
translated: Compassionate one, you possess the way to accomplish generosity,

original: padma'i zhabs mnga' 'gag med seng ge'i @86b sgras ;
analyzed: padma'i zhabs mnga' 'gag med seng ge'i @86b sgras ;
translated: With lotus feet, your unobstructed lion's roar

original: /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel byed ma //
analyzed: /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel byed ma //
translated: Removes all beings' suffering without exception.

original: dpal ldan lha mo khyod 'dra'i gsung la 'dud //
analyzed: dpal ldan lha mo khyod 'dra'i gsung la 'dud //
translated: I bow to your speech, glorious goddess.

original: tshogs gnyis mthar phyin sa bcu rim bgrod nas //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis mthar phyin sa bcu rim bgrod nas //
translated: Having perfected the two accumulations and traversed the ten stages,

original: thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can re 'dod skong //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can re 'dod skong //
translated: Through the power of compassion, you fulfill the wishes of sentient beings.

original: spros pa'i mtha' bral bde ba chen po'i ngang //
analyzed: spros pa'i mtha' bral bde ba chen po'i ngang //
translated: Free from the extremes of conceptual elaboration, you are the state of great bliss.

original: yang dag don rtogs lha mo'i thugs la 'dud //
analyzed: yang dag don rtogs lha mo'i thugs la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, goddess, whose mind realizes the ultimate truth.

original: phyag g-yas mchod sbyin p'i dza pha la yis //
analyzed: phyag g-yas mchod sbyin p'i dza pha la yis //
translated: With your right hand in the gesture of generosity,

original: 'jigs pa brgyad skyob 'gro rnams dbang du sdud //
analyzed: 'jigs pa brgyad skyob 'gro rnams dbang du sdud //
translated: you protect beings from the eight dangers and bring them under your care.

original: dbul ba sel zhing log 'dren 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: dbul ba sel zhing log 'dren 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: You dispel poverty and destroy the misleading forces of evil.

original: g-yon pa thugs kar rin chen snye ma 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yon pa thugs kar rin chen snye ma 'dzin //
translated: With your left hand at your heart, you hold a jewel and a stalk of rice,

original: dgos 'dod re skong dpag bsam shing lta bu //
analyzed: dgos 'dod re skong dpag bsam shing lta bu //
translated: fulfilling all needs and desires like a wish-fulfilling tree.

original: yid bzhin nor 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: Like a wish-fulfilling gem, I bow down to you.

original: bdag gis khyod la rtag tu mchod byed cing //
analyzed: bdag gis khyod la rtag tu mchod byed cing //
translated: I constantly make offerings to you

original: gus dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rab bstod na //
analyzed: gus dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rab bstod na //
translated: and praise you with a devoted mind.

original: gdong la mchi mas rab tu gos gyur kyang //
analyzed: gdong la mchi mas rab tu gos gyur kyang //
translated: Even though my face is covered with tears,

original: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig ma 'dor na //
analyzed: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig ma 'dor na //
translated: I will not let go of the suffering of poverty for a moment.

original: sngon gyi thugs rje'i smon lam gang du thal //üîΩlas kyi 'phro med sbyin shugs zad pa yis //
analyzed: sngon gyi thugs rje'i smon lam gang du thal // las kyi 'phro med sbyin shugs zad pa yis //
translated: Where has the compassion of your former aspirations gone?üîΩBecause the force of your generosity has been exhausted,

original: phun sum tshogs pa'i skal ba med gyur kyang //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa'i skal ba med gyur kyang //
translated: those without the karmic connection have no share in your abundance.

original: tshe 'dir phongs pas log 'tsho spong tsam gyi //
analyzed: tshe 'dir phongs pas log 'tsho spong tsam gyi //
translated: Why not give a few drops of compassion

original: thugs rje'i thigs pa 'ga' tsam cis mi sbyin //
analyzed: thugs rje'i thigs pa 'ga' tsam cis mi sbyin //
translated: To those who are poor in this life and abandon wrong livelihood?

original: dus 'di nas bzung tshe rabs thams cad du //
analyzed: dus 'di nas bzung tshe rabs thams cad du //
translated: From this time forth, in all my lives,

original: 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la mchod byed cing //
analyzed: 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la mchod byed cing //
translated: I will make offerings to the noble VasudharƒÅ,üîΩPractice the MahƒÅyƒÅna secret mantra teachings,

analyzed: theg chen gsang sngags chos la spyod pa dang // bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' nyan cing //
translated: And listen to the words of the guru vajra holder.üîΩMay I realize the meaning of indivisible mahƒÅmudrƒÅ.üîΩHorses, elephants, precious garments,üîΩWashing pools, precious treasuries,
